items.summary: Enrich the site's media sections (hero, about, services) with drone cleaning imagery and video content sourced from the dronebase.it manufacturer page. Embed or reference relevant product images and video (e.g., via an iframe or direct video URL from dronebase.it) showing the DJI Matrice 400 performing cleaning operations. Place a video showcase block in the About section or a dedicated 'Technology' subsection on the homepage.

Add a language switcher to the top header bar supporting English, Greek, Russian, and Hebrew. The switcher should display flag icons or language abbreviations and allow users to toggle between all four languages. All visible site text (navigation, hero, services, about, testimonials, contact, booking form labels, footer) must update to the selected language using placeholder/auto-translated text for each locale. The selected language must persist across page navigation (e.g., via localStorage).
